app.loginClosed: Login servers are down or at the moment closed, probably because of a server restart, wait for 5 minutes and try again
app.loggedInFromAnotherSource: Someone logged in on to this character from another source. Session lost.

home.earlyAccessExplanation: This is a fan / hobby made game, done by a single person and is currently in Open Alpha access.
home.feature1Title: Idle & incremental text MMORPG - hunt and complete quests
home.feature1Description: Start from scratch and build up your character or many characters at once. Be whoever you want in game. Participate in what matters for you and let your character do the grind for you by hunting offline and getting experience. Create a party with your friends or control your own party made with your characters. Complete quests, class quests, daily quests or story driven.
home.feature2Title: Level up your character and make unique builds
home.feature2Description: There are no limits to stats and skills. You can create a character with the characteristics that suit you. Do you want to go follow the meta? Go ahead and talk with other players about what works best. Do you think a Knight with a ton of intelligence is the way to go ? Go ahead. Do you wish to be a tank mage? Sure, go crazy.
home.feature3Description: Assemble teams with the people you meet in game, play with your best friends or play alone and control up to 5 characters in a single team. The game is thought to be playable in various ways. Min/Maxing is not the point. Teamwork and cooperation are important, these are what MMORPGs are about. You won't survive for long all alone or with a single character only. You can create up to 10 characters per account that share the same storage space and bank.
home.feature4Title: Tired of hunting and killing monsters ? Become a crafter, a forger or an alchemist !
home.feature4Description: Equipement get damaged and do break ultimately. Forgers can repair and create new equipement. Apart from starter gear, equipement isn't magically appearing in NPC stores. Someone have to create them and this someone can be you. Become the best crafter the world might know. Buy materials from adventurers and hunters. Forge a huge diversity of weapons and armors or brew potions. Most of the loot is usefull as you can transmute them into what crafters need.
home.feature5Title: Travel the world and face challenges in dungeons.
home.feature5Description: Travel and explore the world, hunt for stronger monsters, get materials from them and sell your loot to other players. Or bring your loot to a crafter to have your loot transformed into gear. When dwelling in the dungeons - don't get lost.
home.feature6Description: Buy or sell goods and lead the economy of the world by opening your shops in each city. Your shops are staying online when you are not ! Trade with players in real time and look for opportunities and good deals. You set your price. If money making is your call, this is the road for you!
home.serverDown:
Our servers are currently down
Retrying in

characterSelect.youAreGuestAccount: You are on a guest account, your data can be easily lost if you like the game, please consider registering an account by clicking here
characterSelect.deleteCharacterConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this character? Type "DELETE" in uppercase letter to confirm.
characterSelect.nameIncorrect: Name is incorrect, please use normal letters and symbols
characterSelect.sessionExpired: Your session expired, please reload the app

chat.needBasicLevel: Need Basic Skill {level} to use chat

craft.youAreCrafting2: at the moment. Your chance for success is
craft.abandonCraftExplanation: You can abandon your work, but you will not recover any of the materials and will not get any experience
craft.confirmationToCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the craft? You WILL NOT receive materials back for canceling the process.

map.overweight: Character is overweight, you cannot travel to another location. Your character need to be below 90% of weight. Discard some items, use them or give them to someone else.

hunt.huntConfigExplanation: This is a place where you pre-configure the fights for your character, you might do it even during the fight, but it will not take effect until your turn takes place in the hunt
hunt.huntConfigStartingPositionExplanation: Is the position or rank your character starts at the beginning of the round
hunt.huntConfigEscapeSituationExplanation: Allows you to set up a scenario in which you run away by using a Butterfly Wing transporting you away from the battle. It will use a Butterfly Wing per each escape. If you do not have one in your inventory it will not work.
hunt.huntConfigHealingItemsExplanation: Configure which healing items your character will use to restore HP. If there are no such items available, your character will not restore HP.
hunt.huntConfigManaItemsExplanation: Is what kind of healing items your character will use to restore MP. If there are no such items available, your character will not restore MP.
hunt.huntConfigAmmoExplanation: This is only for Archer and Thief jobs. Here you can set up in which order your arrows are used. If your character is out of pre-configured arrows it will use basic melee attack
hunt.huntConfigActiveSkillsExplanation: Are a rotation of skills per every 5 rounds. Skill placed in the first slot will trigger on 1st round, 6th, 11th, 16th etc.
hunt.useWhileMpHigher: Use while MP is higher than
hunt.useWhenHpLower: Use when HP is lower than
hunt.huntConfigTargetPriorityExplanation: In case you're a range character, you can select which target your character should try to prioritize. For example backline if you can reach it. In case it's not applicable, the target will be selected randomly.
hunt.notInRangeActionExplanation: Select what to do in case your character is out of Mana or Arrows, or cannot access any target. Should your character advance into melee range, or stay in the backline and recover mana. Idling recover mana faster than normal attacks.

itemInfo.confirmationToDiscard: Are you sure you want to discard this item?
itemInfo.confirmationToRepair: Do you wish to use these materials in order to repair your item?
itemInfo.repairItemDeclined: You do not have the knowledge to repair or maintain your items (Require Maintain Item or Repair Item skill)

kafra.youWishToResetStats: Ahh... you wish to transform your body? Yes... Yes it is possible... But it requires a very expensive alchemical potion and complex magical procedure. It will cost you a good amount of zeny. Your body should be able to witstand it multiple times, but the more you grow the more expensive it will become. So I advise you not to use my services too much.
kafra.resetBeyond: You have grown beyond our magic and alchemy to rebuild you the way you want. Sorry.
kafra.youWishToResetSkills: You wish to alter your mind and forget what you have learnt? It is...very painful, have you ever heard about lobotomy? Well eh! it's nothing alike, but nevertheless, altering your mind even by using magic is a complex task. The more experience you gain, the more problems it will cause. Until the point of no return is reached.
kafra.insufficientZenyForBarber: Insufficient Zeny to use Barber Shop Service
kafra.insufficientZenyForStorage: Insufficient Zeny to use Kafra Storage Service
kafra.insufficientZenyForBank: Insufficient Zeny to use Bank Service
kafra.needBasicLevel: You need basic level {level} to start using Kafra Storage Services

puzzle.randomChallengeText1: You're feeling a bit lost, at best some of the dungeon's corners feel familiar. You tried hard to navigate through the depths of this forsaken place. As if there is some kind of puzzle that need to be solved?
puzzle.randomChallengeText2: You've reached the stairs leading to the next level, at least that is what you think, but there are more stairs leading down, which way should you go ? You need to solve this puzzle somehow.
puzzle.randomChallengeText3: Are you on the right path? You were sure that you memorized the map of the dungeon very well before dwelling into it.
puzzle.leaderNavigating: The party leader is navigating your party through the dungeon and seems to be lost. It is a very fascinating scene, observing your leader scratching their head connecting dots and corridors on the map.

forgotPassword.characterName: Any existing character name on your account
forgotPassword.successMessage: New password was generated and sent to your email
forgotPassword.errorMessage: Match not found, try different combination

shop.rentPricePerDayExplanation: The rent is paid everyday and can vary day by day depending on multiple factors
shop.shopClosureDaysExplanation: You can specify a duration, in days, for your shop to be open to the public. It will remain open as long as you have the zeny to pay the rent or until expiration of the specified duration. When the shops closes, the cashbox will be transfered to your Kafra Bank and the items to the Kafra Storage.
shop.inWhatDayShopClose: Your shop should stay open for:
shop.openShopPresentYourself: What people see on the market list, make your shop attractive or show what are you selling. Equipment? Potions? Loot?
shop.rentExplanation: There is a flat cost per day that you need to pay for the rent to {location}. It gets deducted every day. If it reaches an amount that you can't afford to pay the rent, shop will be closed, remaining zeny will be lost and all remaining items will be sent to Kafra.
shop.openOwnShop: Open your own shop in city
shop.fileSizeTooLarge: The file's size exceeds the maximum accepted(2MB maximum)
shop.fileResolutionIncorrect: Picture need to be exactly 50x50 in size
shop.shopImageNotice: Please be smart about what you're uploading. Any content presenting nudity, racism and other forms of discrimination WILL get your account banned permanently
shop.needVendingLevelToUpload: You need to have Vending level 10 to upload branded image
shop.buyItemMinDurability: Minimum durability that would allow the transaction
shop.buyItemMaxDurability: Maximum durability that would allow the transaction
shop.buyItemPrice: Your price to buy this item (excl. tax)
shop.youAboutToSell: You are about to sell an item

stats.errorTryingToUpdateStats: Something went wrong while trying to update your stats
stats.strExplanation:
This stat affects the physical power (P.Atk) of the character, melee or range. Melee benefit more from Strength than range.
Primary stat for jobs: Fighter, Thief,Archer
Secondary stat for jobs: Merchant
stats.dexExplanation:
This stat affects character's HIT(Accuracy) and EVA(Evade) parameters. This stat defines how fast a character can complete travels. Speed affects the whole party. This stat also affects the physical power of the character by a little amount. 
Primary stat for jobs: Archer, Thief
stats.intExplanation:
This stat affects the mental power (M.Atk) of the character, allowing to deal massive magic damage
Primary stat for jobs: Mage
stats.vitExplanation:
This stat affects the physical defense (P.Def) and HP and is a mandatory stat for protectors, it is a reasonable choice on any character
Secondary stat for jobs: Fighter
stats.wisExplanation:
This stat affects the healing capabilities of acolyte, magical defense (M.Def) and MP
Primary stat for jobs: Acolyte
Secondary stat for jobs: Mage
stats.lukExplanation:
This stat affects the luck of a character and every other stat and attribute in many ways, mainly is used for crafts, crit chance defense and crit chance attack
Primary stat for jobs: Merchant
Secondary stat for jobs: Thief, Archer

trade.wouldLikeToTrade: would like to trade with you
trade.noPlayersOnLocation: No players on the location to trade
trade.canNotBeTraded: You wanted to trade {itemName}, but it is as if universe itself forbid you to do it and you decided to keep it

tutorial.tutorialText1: Hey there, you seems to be new here. Let me show you around quickly so you do not get lost from the very beginning hehe.
tutorial.tutorialText2: This is your general user interface and this small screen is how this game runs, it is optimized for mobile play. And do you know about "Early Access" games? Well this one is an Early Early Access game! So please be patient when playing it. And in case you have a great idea - send it to the developer on discord or do you want to say something is wrong? Also do it on discord, apreciated any way!
tutorial.tutorialText3: This is your main character info, it will be with you through all out the game, so you can see everything happening with your character or if you're traveling or hunting
tutorial.tutorialText4: This is your party screen. Here you can see and inspect the members of your party. You can also create a party or leave your party.
tutorial.tutorialText5: This is your settings and pre-hunt configuration. If the music is too loud, you can turn it off in there. Or you can switch quickly between your characters from here. And pre-hunt configuration is where you can pre-configure how is your character going to behave in a hunt (battle). For example what active skills to use (when you will have those) and what healing items to consume when low on HP/MP etc. Advance to frontline or stay in the back, etc.
tutorial.tutorialText6: Here are your main game actions, they are used to hunt, to shop, to store items, save your location and basically for a lot of small and big actions in the game
tutorial.tutorialText7: Your chat. Chat is NOT persistent meaning you will lose all of chat logs on page refresh. Regular chat with other players. System chat for messages like about items you used, equipped, sold, or error messages and finally Battle chat for battle logs.
tutorial.tutorialText8: In the bottom here you will find everything related to your character. Equipment, stats, skills, attributes and everything character related. Map, to travel to places. Quest board - main line quests, job change quest (when you reach Job Level to 10), random daily quests that drop every day at 4:00 UTC. And finally inventory, your character's personal bag. In there you can see what are you carrying with you right now, you can also use any healing items from it or discard items from your inventory, but be careful, discarded items are lost forever
tutorial.tutorialText9: That's about it. IMPORTANT! You should start with quests in the beggining, they will teach you how to start playing in of a humble yet narrative way. Also you will receive your own very first weapon! Woaw ! Good luck and thank you for playing!

party.huntTogether: Hunt together (if characters are on same location they automatically join the hunt)
party.huntIndependence: Hunt independence (manual join is required from each member)
party.huntPreferencesCaution: With caution (hunt as little monster as possible to be in advantage)
party.huntPreferencesYolo: YOLO leveling (gather every monster around, usually the amount of your party size)
party.travelIndependent: Travel independence. Travel as solo player independently from a party
party.travelTogether: Travel together. Travel together with all party's members to the same location. In this state party members must not craft, rest at an inn or hunt. In this case error system message will be sent to the party.
party.travelTogetherIgnore: Travel together if possible. Travel together with all party's members to the same location. In case a member is busy crafting, resting, hunting - party will travel anyway leaving out the members of the party who are busy.
party.needBasicLevelToOrganize: You need to have Basic Skill level {level} to organize party
party.needBasicLevelToJoin: You need to have Basic Skill level {level} to join party
party.typeNameToInvite: Type in name you want to invite to the team
party.confirmationToLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the party?
party.confirmationToKick: Are you sure you want to kick this member out of the party?

settings.copyLinkToProfile: Copy link to your public profile
settings.linkToProfileCopied: Link to public profile copied to clipboard

transmute.itemTransmutationExplanation: Item transmutation is a skill that allow intellectual such as Alchemists, Wizards and Sages to transmute a given item into another one. By breaking it down into protons and atoms and then reconstructing it. The science world is still discovering new formulas, but basic formulas to create more or less common materials are well-known and practiced by  Merchants and Mages alike.
transmute.formulasBelow: Below are the formulas that are available to you.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.fieldIsEmpty: One of the password fields is empty
changePassword.passwordIncorrectLength: Password must be at least {length} characters long
changePassword.passwordDoesNotMatch: New password and Confirm passwords does not match

ship.overweight: Character carries such burden the captain refuses you board the ship. Discard some items, put them in storage, use them or give it to someone else.
